base_description: Rectangular USB drive, gray and yellow.
part_description: The object has two parts: a larger gray rectangular body and a smaller yellow rectangular section attached at one end.
internal_interaction_description: The yellow section likely serves as a protective cap or cover for the USB connector, fitting snugly over the gray body to secure it when not in use.
external_interaction_description: The USB drive connects to a computer or device via its USB connector, allowing data transfer. The yellow cover protects the connector from dust and damage when not plugged in.
